last_episode_to_air.name: The End of the Adventure
last_episode_to_air.overview: Taichi, Yamato, Sora, Koushiro, Mimi, Joe, Takeru, Hikari. The children and Digimon, their journey, their fated path, is about to reach an end. See you Digimon, someday, somewhere!

name: Digimon Adventure:
original_name: デジモンアドベンチャー：
overview: The new anime will take place in 2020 and will feature an all-new story centering on Taichi Yagami when he is in his fifth year in elementary school. His partner is Agumon. The story begins in Tokyo when a large-scale network malfunction occurs. Taichi is preparing for his weekend summer camping trip when the incident happens. Taichi's mother and his younger sister Hikari get stuck on a train that won't stop moving, and Taichi heads to Shibuya in order to help them. However, on his way there, he encounters a strange phenomenon and sweeps him up into the Digital World along with the other DigiDestined.

episodes.name: Tokyo: Digital Crisis!
episodes.overview: While preparing for the upcoming school camp, Taichi Yagami is visited by his new neighbor Koshiro Izumi when they learn that Tokyo’s electronic systems have gone haywire, including the city's trains with Taichi's younger sister Hikari and their mother trapped in one. The two youths run to the nearby station where Taichi is suddenly transported to another world located inside the internet, encountering a wounded Digimon called Koromon. Upon making contact with Koromon, Taichi gains a Digivice while Koromon evolves into Agumon. Koshiro, who also obtained his own Digivice, contacts Taichi and informs him that a horde of Digimon called Argomon are responsible for the chaos with Taichi and Agumon battling them to save the former’s family. Though the remaining Argomon evolves into more powerful forms before overpowering them, Taichi and Agumon’s determination triggers the latter’s evolution into Greymon.

episodes.name: War Game
episodes.overview: Yamato joins Taichi and Koshiro on their mission to stop the Argomon hacking into the U.S. military. On their way there, they learn the Argomon hijacked an American nuclear submarine which is about to launch a nuclear missle. Greymon and Garurumon work together to defeat the Argomon leader who evolves into a perfect form. Yamato then comes with an idea to defeat the leading Argomon which would endanger Greymon and Garurumon, but Taichi convinces him to proceed as their Digimon launch point blank attacks at the Argomon leader. But the Argomon leader survives and evolves into his ultimate form as the missile is launched. Koshiro informs them that the missile is targeting Tokyo, and when Taichi and Yamato refuse to give up, their Digimon partners suddenly merge into Omnimon when Hikari and Yamato’s younger brother Takeru came in contact with some feathers falling from the sky.

episodes.name: And to the Digital World
episodes.overview: The US army's tactical network had been corroded by Digimon, causing military systems to go haywire. Taichi and the others fight desperately against the enemy Digimon in order to put an end to the threat of the missile launch, however the more enemy Digimon they defeat, the more they evolve. And finally, the missiles are launched at Tokyo. Furthermore, bullets of light fired by the enemy Digimon hit Greymon and Garurumon directly. Then, an enormous white Digimon appears... !?

episodes.name: Birdramon Takes Flight
episodes.overview: Taichi arrives in a world called the "Digital World" where Digimon live. His classmate Sora appears there, and together with Taichi and Agumon, they begin their journey by heading for a "shrine".

episodes.name: Holy Digimon
episodes.overview: The time frame for Tokyo's urban functions coming to a halt was drawing near. Taichi, Agumon and Sora head for a "shrine" written about on a lithograph of the Digital World in search of clues. Meanwhile, Koshiro, who is at another location in the Digital World, continues to gather information along with Tentomon, the Digimon he met there, while keeping in contact with Taichi. During that time, Koshiro and Tentomon get swallowed by a mysterious huge Digimon...

episodes.name: The Targeted Kingdom
episodes.overview: Taichi’s party comes across an orchard and meets a mysterious girl, Mimi. Taichi and his friends find out that a kingdom is targeted by some ferocious Digimon.

episodes.name: That Boy is Joe Kido
episodes.overview: The children now know that the Holy Digimon is the key to saving Tokyo from the blackouts. They attempt to cross the sea to get to the continent, but they’re suddenly attacked by a mysterious whirlpool.

episodes.name: The Children's Siege
episodes.overview: The children finally succeed in crossing the sea with Ikkakumon’s help. However, what awaits them on the other side is a fortress full of Digimon…

episodes.name: The Ultimate Invasion
episodes.overview: The six children and Digimon neutralize the fortress thanks to excellent teamwork. They try to decode the enemy’s communication log and obtain new information about the Holy Digimon. However, it’s not long before new enemies approach the fortress one after another.

episodes.name: The Super Evolution of Steel
episodes.overview: The battle between Greymon and Orgemon ended abruptly and now the Chosen Ones discuss their next move. Taichi and Agumon take a chance to defeat the ultimate enemy, so that the others can safely head to their next destination.

episodes.name: The Man Who Increases the Energy
episodes.overview: The six Chosen Ones who had finally gathered split up again into two teams in order to find the Holy Digimon. As Yamato’s team attempts to cross the desert, they encounter some dust devils.

episodes.name: Lilymon Blossoms
episodes.overview: Taichi’s team reaches an ancient ruin. While Koshiro tries to analyze the characters on the walls, Mimi and Palmon accidentally fall underground. When they’re in danger, they encounter a kindhearted Digimon.

episodes.name: The Crimson Wings Garudamon
episodes.overview: Yamato’s team flies above an endless jungle on Birdramon until they come across a floating fortress. Sora’s caring heart that wants to save Digimon in trouble brings about a new glow on Piyomon.

episodes.name: Crash, The King of Insect
episodes.overview: Taichi’s team reaches a canyon where they are attacked by a swarm of insect Digimon. In the chaos that ensues, Koshiro and Tentomon stand up to protect their friends.

episodes.name: Zudomon, The Iron Hammer of Lightning
episodes.overview: While Taichi’s team finishes fighting off Oukuwamon and Kuwagamon in the canyon maze, Sora’s team reaches a snowy mountain where they are attacked by a group of Digimon. Joe and Ikkakumon stand up to save Sora from danger.

episodes.name: The Jet-Black Shadow Invades Tokyo
episodes.overview: Taichi’s team finds a strange cave that leads to Tokyo. Excited to be back, the children attempt to get home through the subway. However, a creepy Digimon prowls the city, and there, the children learn a shocking truth.

episodes.name: The Battle In Tokyo Against Orochimon
episodes.overview: Just when Taichi and his friends thought they had finally defeated the enemy in the fake Tokyo, a new enemy appeared. The children work together with their Digimon to take down the eight-headed Ultimate Digimon.

episodes.name: Countdown to Tokyo's Annihilation
episodes.overview: The Chosen Ones worked together and succeeded in defeating Ultimate Digimon Orochimon. However, a mysterious countdown begins. To save Tokyo, they must prevent it from reaching zero

episodes.name: The Fist of The Beast King Roars
episodes.overview: Thanks to Omegamon’s reappearance, the Mega Digimon Nidhoggmon, was finally defeated. However, Sora and the others disappeared after being swallowed by a storm. Taichi and Yamato, who are left behind in the Digital World sneak into Valvemon.

episodes.name: The Seventh One Awakens
episodes.overview: Yamato’s younger brother, Takeru, is unexpectedly found in the Digital World, held captive by a powerful Digimon. With the help of Leomon’s army, Taichi and Yamato attempt to save Takeru.

episodes.name: The Update of Reversal
episodes.overview: The Holy Digimon that turned into a Digitama was snatched away, and Taichi and Yamato chase after Skullknightmon. Meanwhile, the rest of the Chosen Ones that are back in Tokyo fight remotely with their partner Digimon in the Digital World.

episodes.name: The Indomitable Blue Sagittarius
episodes.overview: Thanks to Takeru’s bravery, Taichi and the others found the way into the castle where the Digitama is held. As for the Chosen Ones in Tokyo, they were in a remote battle against Calamaramon to stop an uncontrollable tanker from crashing.

episodes.name: The Messanger of Darkness, Devimon
episodes.overview: Devimon’s castle collapsed after the fierce battle with Darkknightmon and Taichi’s group comes to face Devimon at last. Meanwhile, the rest of the Chosen Ones and their partner Digimon fight to destroy the obelisk that is transferring energy.

episodes.name: The Final Stage, Donedevimon
episodes.overview: Thanks to Koshiro’s group destroying the obelisk which was transferring energy to the Digital World, Taichi and the others defeated Neodevimon at last. However, Taichi struggles against the overwhelming powers of Donedevimon

episodes.name: Dive To The Next Ocean
episodes.overview: The battle with Donedevimon is over at last. However, destiny wasted no time in bringing the next adventure to the Chosen Ones. Koshiro’s group is dealing with tanker collisions while Taichi’s group is attacked by a cluster of Mamemon.

episodes.name: Breakthrough, The Sea Beast Encircling Net
episodes.overview: Taichi has fallen down to the ocean below Cloud Continent with Leomon and the others. Powerful, new Digimon attack them one after another. Meanwhile, Koshiro’s side tries carry out a counterplan to bring the unresponsive ships under control.

episodes.name: To the New Continent
episodes.overview: Taichi’s younger sister Hikari and Koshiro's group are brought to the Digital World just in time to save Taichi's group. The Chosen Ones are now reunited once again. However, another disaster, this time at a rocket launch site, hits the real world.

episodes.name: The Children's Fight for Survival
episodes.overview: The Chosen Ones come to face their old enemy, Darkknightmon. Patamon evolves into Angemon again to fight off Darkknightmon. However, the children are all separated and sent to different parts of the continent.

episodes.name: Escape the Burning Jungle
episodes.overview: Hikari is suddenly taken away by Skullknightmon and Taichi could do nothing but watch. On his mission to save Hikari, he meets many kinds of Digimon in the jungle and fights for them as the jungle burns.

episodes.name: The Mega Digimon, Wargreymon
episodes.overview: Taichi and Agumon act as bait so that the jungle’s Digimon can safely escape. However, Metalgreymon’s attacks are useless against the new Mega Digimon that stands in their way.

episodes.name: A new Darkness, Millenniumon
episodes.overview: Taichi and Agumon finally surpassed their limit, and Agumon evolves into Wargreymon. This evolution awakens Lopmon’s long-lost memories. And Taichi learns about the new threat, Millenniumon.

episodes.name: Soaring Hope
episodes.overview: Taichi’s group is continuing their adventure with Komondomon. They reunite with Takeru and Patamon, who are targeted by Fangmon. However, yet another threat is creeping up on them.

episodes.name: The Hikari of Dawn
episodes.overview: Taichi’s party finally catches sight of Skullknightmon and Hikari, who was kidnapped. Taichi chases after them, but Hikari is swallowed into the darkness.

episodes.name: Hikari and Tailmon
episodes.overview: Hikari and Tailmon are finally saved and they join Taichi’s group. Komondomon dives into a sea current to head toward their next destination. As they make their way underwater, they come across a mysterious city.

episodes.name: Glittering Angewomon
episodes.overview: Taichi’s party leaves behind the beautiful underwater city and continues their journey toward the Eternal Continent’s center, FAGA. The party swims through the sea caves on Komondomon, but Digimon with powerful, dark energy block their way.

episodes.name: Operation Satellite Sniper
episodes.overview: Taichi’s group reunites with Koshiro and Tentomon after rising to the surface. Koshiro figures out a plan to stop the International Space Station from crashing into Tokyo. Will the Chosen Ones make it in time?!

episodes.name: Mimi-chan Wars
episodes.overview: With the ISS no longer being a threat, Taichi and his party continues their adventure. Taichi and Sora, who go out to look for food, happen to reunite with Mimi and Palmon. Then they are suddenly pulled into Mimi’s project.

episodes.name: Burning Blue Friendship
episodes.overview: Yamato and Gabumon were on their way to rejoin the other Chosen Ones. However, they happened to pass by some mountains where a Digimon with an evil spell is. Now, great danger approaches Gabumon. Can Yamato save Gabumon in time?!

episodes.name: Jyagamon's Potato Hell
episodes.overview: The eight Chosen Ones finally come together. They make a pit stop at the so-called Digimon’s oasis. There, Joe befriends a potato-loving Digimon, but his new friend’s love and sorrow over fries cause trouble.

episodes.name: Strike! The Killer Shot
episodes.overview: When the group rests and spends some time relaxing and playing soccer, a floating island appears in the skies and some bombs start to rain that hit a part of the field where they are followed by a fruit. Together with Taichi and Agumon, Sora and Birdramon fly to the island to look for more fruit.

episodes.name: Mon-Mon Park in the Fog
episodes.overview: While looking for food, Yamato and Takeru with their Digimon, arrive at an amusement place called Mon-Mon Park. They have fun until they come across a Xiaomon who reveals the park is dangerous.

episodes.name: King of Inventors, Gerbemon
episodes.overview: Taichi, Agumon, Koshiro and Tentomon travel with Komondomon to explore the surroundings, but are shocked when they find a large landfill in front of them. They are even more shocked to find Gerbemon, Tyumon and Raremon there.

episodes.name: Clash, the King of Digimon
episodes.overview: The Chosen Ones come across an unfamiliar forest. There they meet Etemon and Volcamon who are battling over the title for the King of Digimon. Taichi and others are dragged into their fight.

episodes.name: Hikari and the Moving Forest
episodes.overview: After travelling through many fields, the Chosen Ones finally come upon a forest. However, they find that the forest itself makes up a Digimon’s body. Hikari and the Chosen Ones help this Digimon fight an old nemesis.

episodes.name: Activate, Metalgarurumon
episodes.overview: The Digi-Destined come across an old race track. Garurumon is thrilled to challenge Machmon,it's last remaining competitor in a race. The twists and turns of the race with the Yamato-Gabumon's bond enables them to reach the Mega level.

episodes.name: The Sword of Hope
episodes.overview: Takeru and Angemon must face an old enemy...

episodes.name: The Villains of the Wastelands
episodes.overview: Taichi and Agumon along with Nohemon are tasked with rescuing Joe and Gomamon from a pair of Dinosaur-type Digimon that are fighting each other over the only source of water in the area.

episodes.name: The Attack of Mugendramon
episodes.overview: The DigiDestined children finally arrives in FAGA, only to be received by the might Mugendramon and to starts a great battle with a shocking outcome.

episodes.name: The God of Evil Descends, Millenniumon
episodes.overview: After the shocking conclusion of the epic battle of Mugendramon and Wargreymon, the DigiDestined children do not have time to overcome their sorrow for the tragic pass of Taichi and his partner digimon, and must find a way to prevent Millienniumon's resurrection. But will they make it?

episodes.name: The End, The Ultimate Holy Battle
episodes.overview: Taichi and WarGreymon returns! And with the faith of their friends and digimon, they begin the decisive battle.

episodes.name: The Mystery Hidden in the Crests
episodes.overview: The Great Catastrophe draws near. New mysteries surface and the DigiDestined next battle begins.

episodes.name: Dance of the Heavens, Hououmon
episodes.overview: Sora and Garudamon are swallowed into the boiling lava. But that's when the wings of miracles flutter.

episodes.name: The Geko Hot Springs' Revolt
episodes.overview: Will Joe-Senpai be able to save the captured Gomamon and free the hot springs from the domain of the hot springs' ruler Tonosamagekomon?

episodes.name: The Vagrant War Demon, Rebellimon
episodes.overview: Can Taichi and Greymon move Rebellimon's heart and bring peace to the lawless lands?

episodes.name: The Digimon School Under Attack
episodes.overview: A shadow looms over the Digimon school. Will Mimi be able to save the school from being ruined?

episodes.name: The Gold Wolf of the Crescent Moon
episodes.overview: A misty forest where screams can be heard. A hero with a legendary sword returns. And the wolf who rises to his feet will finally shine gold.

episodes.name: Contact from the Catastrophe
episodes.overview: There are too many Taichis! Will Agumon be able to find the real one?

episodes.name: Hikari, New Life
episodes.overview: Hikari and Angewomon are protecting the digitamas at the Petaldramon's Forest. But when evil forces comes in, the fear of annihilation approaches.

episodes.name: Bolt, Herakle Kabuterimon
episodes.overview: Will Koshiro be able to solve the riddles that Nanomon makes?

episodes.name: Conquer the Glacier, Vikemon
episodes.overview: With his pride as a leader in doubt, Joe challenges Olegmon to battle. That is when a brand new digivolution are unlocked.

episodes.name: A Place to Return To
episodes.overview: Takeru's warm heart that tries to send Eldoradimon home causes a miracle.

episodes.name: The Tears of Shakkoumon
episodes.overview: Shakkoumon, the guardian deity awakes! Will Sora and Birdramon be able to calm down the angel of the Ancient Digital World?

episodes.name: The Crest of Courage
episodes.overview: Taichi is separated from Agumon, then he forms a bound with a very peculiar baby digimon. Will Taichi have the courage to overcome this harsh test without his longtime partner?

episodes.name: The Angels' Determination
episodes.overview: The worst enemy has made his final move. Amid their most dangerous crisis yet, the DigiDestineds' biggest battle begins.

episodes.name: The Great Catastrophe, Negamon
episodes.overview: The DigiDestined looked, and behold a dark octopus with an unique yellow eye. The true form of the Great Catastrophe is revealed through Algomon's words: and his name was Negamon, and the end of all things followed with him.

episodes.name: The Last Miracle, The Last Power
episodes.overview: The Great Catastrophe, the absolute threat! Is the world going to disappear this way? The 8 DigiDestined kids beside with your digimon partners in all of their Mega Forms, initiates the big battle of all.

episodes.name: The End of the Adventure
episodes.overview: Taichi, Yamato, Sora, Koushiro, Mimi, Joe, Takeru, Hikari. The children and Digimon, their journey, their fated path, is about to reach an end. See you Digimon, someday, somewhere!
